comments:
I had 2 Ant breakpoints
Exported.
Attempted to import with the breakpoints existing in the workspace and having both update existing breakpoints enabled:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.actions.ImportBreakpointsOperation.findGeneralMarker(ImportBreakpointsOperation.java:243)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.actions.ImportBreakpointsOperation.access$1(ImportBreakpointsOperation.java:232)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.actions.ImportBreakpointsOperation$1.run(ImportBreakpointsOperation.java:99)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1733)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1715)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.actions.ImportBreakpointsOperation.run(ImportBreakpointsOperation.java:126)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

Reworked the ImportBreakpointsOperation to handle null charstarts.

As well I removed the exception hiding (and the dangerous catching of Exception with printStackTrace())that appeared to be occuring so that all of the core exceptions will be propagated up as InvocationTargetExceptions
